title: neekE dhayaraka
sahitya:
nIkE dayarAka nE jEyu panulella nera vErurA rAma



anupallavi



 E kOpincaka nEnu nIvanu jnAni kElAgu sukhamiccunE O rAghava



caraNam 1



 manasu nilvani vAru mAya jAlamu jEsi mari mukti konanaumE 

kanu samjnuku rAni kAntanu balimi garamida vAsamaunE O rAghava

   

caraNam 2



 vADuka lEni vidyala cEta sabhalOna vAdinca bOnaunE

sATi vinnamATa madini nilpa lEni sarasuni viTamaunE O rAghava

   

caraNam 3



 meppulakai bahu dharmamu jEsina migula brOva tagunE 

tappu mATalu gAdu tAraka nAma shrI tyAgarAjuni paini O rAghava
